title: Environmental Permit Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of environmental permits and authorizations.

terms.label: Air Emission Permit
terms.definition: A permit governing emissions of air pollutants from a facility or activity.

terms.label: Water Discharge Permit
terms.definition: A permit regulating discharges of wastewater or other effluents to surface or groundwater bodies.

terms.label: Waste Management Permit
terms.definition: A permit covering generation, storage, treatment, or disposal of solid or hazardous waste.

terms.label: Land Use or Development Permit
terms.definition: An authorization for land development, site alteration, or resource extraction activities with environmental impacts.

terms.label: Emissions Trading or Quota Authorization
terms.definition: An authorization or allocation under an emissions trading, cap-and-trade, or quota system for environmental impacts such as greenhouse gases.

terms.label: Other Environmental Permit
terms.definition: An environmental permit type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
